title: Custom Radio
description: Custom Radio lets you browse and play your own `.wav` music files directly from the `/RADIO` folder, giving you full control over your playlist.
author: @CodyTolene

meta.controls: Turn the top-left knob to scroll through songs. Press it to play or stop a track.
meta.instructions: Upload your '.wav' files to the '/RADIO' folder. To open on the Pip-Boy navigate to the tab RADIO > CUSTOM.
meta.tip: Avoid adding more than 100 songs to the `/RADIO` folder to keep performance smooth. Press the knob again to stop playback.
